description: Maps the detection type to the corresponding audio alert type (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/infra/safetyeventtriagemodels/detection_util.go)

schema.name: detection_type
schema.description: The numerical value for a detection type

schema.name: detection_type_name
schema.description: The name of the detection type

schema.name: audio_alert_type
schema.description: The ID of the audio alert type

schema.name: audio_alert_type_name
schema.description: The name of the audio alert type
